plot: When Adams and his crew are sent to investigate the silence from a planet inhabited by scientists, he finds all but two have died. Dr. Morbius and his daughter Altaira have somehow survived a hideous monster which roams the planet. Unknown to Adams, Morbius has made a discovery, and has no intention of sharing it (or his daughter!) with anyone.

m.role: Officer and a Gentleman: The Captain is one, and protects naive Altaira from his lewd crew.

Overprotective Dad: Morbius, subconsciously. Morbius said Altaira could leave for Earth whenever she wished, and might have even believed it at the time. The unconscious desires of his id have a different opinion, to the point that they manifest as a monster to destroy others in order to protect her.
Papa Bear: A shipload of sex starved spacemen sniffing around his daughter brings out Morbius' 'creature from the id' eventually endangering even her with its unreasoning possessive rage.

f.role: Altaira from Forbidden Planet has no problem skinny-dipping in front of strangers, having lived with only her father and a robot most of her life.
Innocent Fanservice Girl: Altaira, being completely unaccustomed to normal social mores. (Though if you look when she gets out of the water you can see she's wearing a flesh colored suit)
Mad Scientist's Beautiful Daughter: Altaira's father, Dr. Morbius, keeps her completely isolated from the social world outside Altair IV.

name: Forbidden Planet
